basics.name: Sarah Shakoori
basics.label: Full-Stack Engineer
basics.summary: Enthusiastic junior full-stack engineer. Proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with hands-on experience in React and Node.js. Familiar with Git, databases, and deploying web applications. Demonstrates problem-solving abilities, commits to coding best practices, and excels in collaboration and communication.

work.summary: Contributed as a PHP developer, leveraging expertise in server-side scripting to build and maintain dynamic web applications.
work.name: Exir Research
highlights: Developed and maintained server-side logic using PHP.
Implemented database interactions, utilizing MySQL to store and retrieve data.
Implemented CRUD operations in PHP to facilitate seamless data management within web applications.
Developed and maintained administrative interfaces, enhancing the user experience in managing website content.
Deployed PHP applications to Apache servers

work.summary: Contributed to front-end development projects as a junior developer, employing proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create engaging and responsive user interfaces.
work.name: Exir Research
highlights: Developed and maintained responsive user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Translated design mockups (PSD) into pixel-perfect, code-based UI components using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Implemented CSS styling techniques for consistent branding and optimal user experience across platforms.
Collaborated closely with design teams, ensuring accurate interpretation and seamless integration of UI/UX concepts.
Leveraged JavaScript for interactive features, enhancing user engagement and overall website functionality.

work.summary: Provided IT support, troubleshooting hardware and software issues, assisting users with technical inquiries.
work.name: Tehran Municipality
highlights: Provided IT support, resolving hardware and software issues promptly.
Assisted in setup and maintenance of computer systems, ensuring optimal functionality.
Collaborated on troubleshooting network connectivity problems.
Offered user training to boost IT literacy and independence in issue resolution.
